resources.string: The meat is blanched to get rid of the scum, then braised till tender, then finally steamed. Do not skip the steaming step as it is believed to make the meat more tender while retaining its shape and produce melt-in-your-mouth fats.

Scrambled eggs with tomatoes is a home-cooked dish. To make them smooth and delicious with moderate moisture, there is still a bit of skill. The perfect combination of egg aroma and tomato sweetness, sour and sweet taste, interweave a juicy and soft taste, simple but delicious, let the most ordinary homely food with five-star quality. The classic home-cooked dish, scrambled eggs with tomatoes, is a staple of the family dinner table.
